name: Blót (Julius Winther)
description:
Blót

Blot - a blood sacrifice meant for the Norse gods of old. You have escaped from capture and sacrifice. Make your way to the boat to get out of the dark forest.

NOTE: Victory has not been implemented yet. But feel free to close the game when you find the boat. Or keep on exploring while listening to the dark ambience.

Assets:
  • Terrain tools - mgear
  • Simple Water Shader URP - IgniteCoders
  • Real Stars Skybox Lite - Geoff Dallinmore
  • Old Rowboat - Gabro Media
  • Modular Medieval Lanterns - Alexand Voevodov
  • Grass Flowers Pack Free - ALP8310
Music:
  • Godeater - Lustmord
  • Haze - Lustmord
